sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import AnimationRevealPage from "helpers/AnimationRevealPage.js"; import tw from "twin.macro"; import styled from "styled-components"; import Header from "components/headers/light.js"; import Footer from "components/footers/MiniCenteredFooter.js"; import { Container, ContentWithPaddingXl } from "components/misc/Layouts"; import { SectionHeading, Subheading as SubheadingBase } from "components/misc/Headings"; const HeadingRow = tw.div`flex flex-col items-center`; const Heading = tw(SectionHeading)`text-gray-900`; const Subheading = tw(SubheadingBase)`text-primary-500 mb-4`; const Description = tw.p`mt-4 text-gray-600 text-center max-w-2xl`; const SectionTitle = tw.h2`text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mt-16 mb-6`; const FindingsGrid = tw.div`grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mt-8`; const FindingCard = tw.div`bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6 border-t-4 border-primary-500`; const FindingTitle = tw.h3`text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3`; const FindingText = tw.p`text-gray-600 leading-relaxed`; const ChartPlaceholder = tw.div`bg-gray-100 rounded-xl p-8 flex items-center justify-center text-gray-500 h-64 mt-8`; const InsightBox = tw.div`bg-primary-100 rounded-xl p-6 mt-8`; const InsightTitle = tw.h4`text-primary-700 font-bold mb-2`; const InsightText = tw.p`text-primary-600`; const MetricRow = tw.div`flex flex-wrap gap-6 mt-8 justify-center`; const MetricCard = styled.div` ${tw`bg-white rounded-xl shadow p-6 text-center min-w-[200px]`} `; const MetricValue = tw.div`text-3xl font-bold text-primary-500`; const MetricLabel = tw.div`text-gray-600 mt-2`; export default () => { return (
Findings Results & Analysis 我们对 LLM-as-a-Judge 的综合评估结果和关键发现。 87.3% Average Accuracy 15.2% Position Bias Rate 0.82 Inter-model Agreement 23% Length Bias Impact Key Findings 🎯 Position Bias 大多数 LLM 评判者表现出位置偏见，倾向于偏好出现在特定位置的响应。 GPT-4 和 Claude-3 在这方面表现最为稳定。 📏 Length Preference 较长的响应通常获得更高的评分，即使内容质量相似。 这种偏见在评估创意写作任务时尤为明显。 🔄 Self-Enhancement Bias LLM 评判者倾向于给自己生成的内容更高的分数。 这种自我增强偏见在某些模型中高达 12%。 📊 Consistency 在重复评估相同内容时，不同模型的一致性差异显著。 顶级模型的自我一致性达到 90% 以上。 Performance Comparison 📊 Performance comparison chart will be displayed here
(可以集成 Chart.js 或 Recharts 来展示可视化图表) 💡 Key Insight 我们的研究表明，虽然 LLM 作为评判者展现出令人印象深刻的能力， 但仍存在系统性偏见需要解决。建议在实际应用中采用多模型投票 或人机协作的方式来提高评判的可靠性。 Detailed Results by Category 📈 Detailed breakdown by task category
(分类任务的详细结果分析)
); };
